measure_type.en: If your good contains items made from seal products

sub_text.en: Seal products may only be placed on the market when they are accompanied by an attesting document or a written notification of import and a document giving evidence where the products were acquired

caption.en: If your good contains items made from seal products

question.en: Which of the following applies to your goods?
question.cy: Pa un o'r canlynol sy'n berthnasol i'ch nwyddau?
